address1.description: Gets or sets the first address line.

address2.description: Gets or sets the second address line.

citizenship.description: Gets or sets the citizenship ISO 3166-1 alfa-2 country codes (Two characters) of this contact person. This property is defined as string in the documentation.

city.description: Gets or sets the address city.

dateOfBirth.description: Gets or sets the date of birth of this contact person.

emailAddress.description: Gets or sets the email address.

externalCode.description: Gets or sets the external code - can be used to reference the contact person in the external system.

firstName.description: Gets or sets the first name.

gender.description: Gets or sets the Gender of this contact person.

hasNorwegianSSN.description: Gets or sets a value indicative of whether this contact person has a norwegian social security number or not

id.description: Gets the identifier. This identifier is unique and assigned by PowerOffice Go when a new entity is saved, and should be provided when an entity should be edited. If this identifier is not provided, PowerOffice Go will try to create a new entity.

isActive.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this contact person is active.

isPep.description: Gets or sets if the contact person is a politically exposed person (PEP).

isRca.description: Gets or sets if the contact person has relatives or close associates of PEP (RCA)

lastName.description: Gets or sets the last name.

partyCustomerCode.description: Gets the code of the Customer that this contact person is associated with

partyId.description: Gets the id of the Customer and/or Supplier this contact person is for.

partySupplierCode.description: Gets the code of the Supplier that this contact person is associated with

phoneNumber.description: Gets or sets the phone number.

placeOfBirth.description: Gets or sets the place of birth of this contact person.

residenceCountryCode.description: Gets or sets the ISO 3166-1 alfa-2 country code (Two characters) of this contact persons country of residence.

socialSecurityNumber.description: Sets the social security number for this contact person

zipCode.description: Gets or sets the address zip code.
